alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ada, west central Boise, southwestern Valley, northeastern Payette, northeastern Canyon, Gem and southeastern Washington Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emmett, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emmett, Eagle, Star, Horseshoe Bend, Ola, Banks, Gardena, Sweet, Paddock Valley Reservoir, Montour, French Corner, Crane Creek Reservoir, Firebird Speedway, Dodson Pass and High Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
